name: BitsConnect
description:
To maintain happy customers you will need a consistent source of income in CryptoLand. Extending the normal methods, your technique uses a fraction of it to crack open weak digital vaults and plunders the valuable digital data.

All you have to do is connect your BitsConnect to the vault you want to crack in a correct port, and loot the virtual goods.

Instructions:

Left click: Used on nodes to start a wire or end a wire. Click and drag to change camera position.

Right click: Cancel the current wire you are creating.

Scroll wheel: Zoom in or out.
